title: lag
body:
Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
Minimum = 23ms, Maximum = 30ms, Average = 26ms


i used the hextech repair tool. idk why im running at 84 to 90+ MS here in cali near sac =( this is my fav game {{champion:84}}

replies.body:
Big changes in latency (ping) are usually a direct result of routing changes by your ISP or their partners that cause your connection to take a longer path to our servers. While we'll most likely need to take a look at a proper traceroute log to determine exactly where this is happening, I'd first like you to ensure your local network settings are [**compatible with League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

If you continue to experience poor latency in-game after taking those steps, let me know.
used to have a 30 or so MS before the server move from cali LA. now in the past 2 months its just not playable. i play everyother game just fine {{item:3078}}
